title: 292: CHATTY BROS: BIP Episode 1 (Favorites + Differing Opinions + David Spade’s Fedora)
itunes:title: 292: CHATTY BROS: BIP Episode 1 (Favorites + Differing Opinions + David Spade’s Fedora)
description:
The Bros are here to chat about the first episode of this season of Bachelor in Paradise - and of course get a little tangential. They discuss their initial favorites on the beach, Kenny’s tats, Joe’s first day behavior, Tahzjuan being the best, their differing opinions on Noah, and much more!

 

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE:

 Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/
